H0.text: where was st peter killed. Jerusalem

H1.text: where was st peter killed. Antioch

H2.text: where was st peter killed. Corinth

H3.text: where was st peter killed. Rome

A4.text: According to Christian tradition, Peter was crucified in Rome under Emperor Nero.

A5.text: Traditionally, Roman authorities sentenced him to death by crucifixion at Vatican Hill.
